Ad Text:
Senior Data Engineer / Snowflake / Sydney / Permanent / $160,000 + super

About the company

A growing technology consultancy based in Sydney, focused on Data, Cloud, and AI solutions. This business supports clients with scalable, innovative technologies and offers a collaborative, fast-paced environment with space for growth and experimentation.

They are happy to accommodate a Jan or Feb start based on notice periods, but would start interviews this side of Christmas.

About the role

This Senior Data Engineer role sits within a small, high-performing team. You’ll take the lead on delivering Snowflake-centric data engineering solutions—from solution design and architecture through to implementation and optimisation. You’ll mentor junior engineers, guide best practices, and work across modern cloud platforms that heavily leverage Snowflake as the core data environment.

Benefits
$160,000 + Super
Work with cutting-edge Snowflake, cloud, and AI technologies
Supportive and innovative team culture
Flexible working arrangements
Opportunities to grow and take ownership of solutions
Duties/Key responsibilities
Design, build, and optimise robust Snowflake data pipelines, models, and warehouse solutions
Lead client delivery engagements and manage key stakeholder relationships
Mentor junior team members and champion Snowflake and cloud engineering best practices
Work across cloud-based platforms including AWS / GCP and Snowflake, with exposure to Databricks where relevant
Skills and experience
Strong experience in Snowflake architecture, data modelling, ETL/ELT processes, and scalable data pipelines
Proficient in Python, SQL, and/or Spark
Hands-on experience with Snowflake and complementary cloud environments such as Google Cloud or Databricks
Comfortable working directly with clients in consultative, solution-focused engagements
Knowledge of visualisation tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and DevOps practices
Bonus: experience with Snowpipe, streaming data, big data frameworks, or data governance and security best practices
If you’re interested in this opportunity and feel you’re the right fit please click “apply”

About Allura Partners
Allura Partners was founded to support private equity firms by placing C-Suites to lead, transform, and scale portfolio companies. Today, in addition to our proven private equity specialisation, we’ve become a trusted partner for major ASX-listed and private enterprises in Australia, offering executive search, recruitment, and business transformation. Known for integrity, reliability, and results, our expertise spans Executive Search, Accounting & Finance, Transformation & Change, and Technology & Digital. We connect businesses and top-tier talent, exceeding expectations and driving lasting impact.

Senior Data Engineer / Snowflake / Sydney / Permanent / $160,000 + super
